name: Amarok
description: Amarok is a music player with very nice appearance and strong play function. It also well supports Chinese tag and be minimized to the tray on playing.

en_US.description: Amarok is a music player with very nice appearance and strong play function. It also well supports Chinese tag and be minimized to the tray on playing.
en_US.name: Amarok

zh_CN.description: Amarok是一款音乐播放器，有着非常漂亮的外观和强大的播放功能，同时也有很好的中文tag支持，并且可以在播放的时候最小化到托盘。
zh_CN.name: Amarok
